SPI Driver External Data Structures

The section has a list of all the data structures which are exposed to the application. More...

Data Structures

struct  SPI_Transaction_t
 A SPI_Transaction data structure is used with SPI_transfer(). It indicates how many SPI_FrameFormat frames are sent and received from the buffers pointed to txBuf and rxBuf. More...

 A SPI_Stats data structure is used with SPI_getStats() to get driver statistics. More...

typedef enum SPI_Status_e SPI_Status
 Status codes that are set by the SPI driver.
 
typedef struct SPI_Transaction_t SPI_Transaction
 A SPI_Transaction data structure is used with SPI_transfer(). It indicates how many SPI_FrameFormat frames are sent and received from the buffers pointed to txBuf and rxBuf.

 Definitions for SPI loopback modes.
 
typedef enum SPI_TransferMode_e SPI_TransferMode
 SPI transfer mode determines the whether the SPI controller operates synchronously or asynchronously. In SPI_MODE_BLOCKING mode SPI_transfer() blocks code execution until the SPI transaction has completed. Only SPI_MODE_BLOCKING is supported.

Enumerations

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the data structures which are exposed to the application.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct SPI_Config_t SPI_Config

SPI Global configuration.

The SPI_Config structure contains a set of pointers used to characterize the SPI driver implementation.

This structure needs to be defined before calling SPI_init() and it must not be changed thereafter.

See also
SPI_init()
typedef struct SPI_DMAChanCfg_t SPI_DMAChanCfg

SPI DMA channel config.

When DMA is enabled, system DMA channel number need to be provided per transfer group. In SPI slave mode, only one transfer group is used, one pair of DMA channel number(TX and RX) need to configurred. In SPI master mode, DMA channel should be provided per slave profile.

typedef struct SPI_MasterModeParams_t SPI_MasterModeParams

SPI master Parameters.

SPI master Parameters are used with the SPI_open() call when mode is set to SPI_MASTER. Default values for these parameters are set using SPI_Params_init().

See also
SPI_Params_init()
typedef struct SPI_Params_t SPI_Params

SPI Parameters.

SPI Parameters are used to with the SPI_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using SPI_Params_init().

See also
SPI_Params_init()
typedef struct SPI_SlaveModeParams_t SPI_SlaveModeParams

SPI slave mode Parameters.

SPI slave Parameters are used with the SPI_open() call when mode is set to SPI_SLAVE. Default values for these parameters are set using SPI_Params_init().

See also
SPI_Params_init()
typedef struct SPI_SlaveProfile_t SPI_SlaveProfile

SPI slave profile Parameters.

When SPI is configured as master mode, it may connect to multiple slaves. This data structure captures the the configurations for remote slaves.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum MibSpi_LoopBackType_e

Definitions for SPI loopback modes.

Enumerator
SPI_LOOPBK_DIGITAL 

SPI digital loopback mode

SPI_LOOPBK_ANALOG 

SPI analog loopback mode

SPI_LOOPBK_NONE 

SPI loopback disable

enum SPI_DataShiftFmt_e

Definitions for SPI Data shift format.

Enumerator
SPI_MSB_FIRST 

MSB shift out first

SPI_LSB_FIRST 

LSB shift out first

enum SPI_FrameFormat_e

Definitions for various SPI data frame formats.

Enumerator
SPI_POL0_PHA0 

SPI mode Polarity 0 Phase 0

SPI_POL0_PHA1 

SPI mode Polarity 0 Phase 1

SPI_POL1_PHA0 

SPI mode Polarity 1 Phase 0

SPI_POL1_PHA1 

SPI mode Polarity 1 Phase 1

enum SPI_Mode_e

Definitions for various SPI modes of operation.

Enumerator
SPI_MASTER 

SPI in master mode

SPI_SLAVE 

SPI in slave mode

enum SPI_PinMode_e

Definitions for SPI Pins Operation Mode.

Enumerator
SPI_PINMODE_3PIN 

3 Pin operation Mode

SPI_PINMODE_4PIN_CS 

4 Pin operation Mode with CS signal

enum SPI_TransferMode_e

SPI transfer mode determines the whether the SPI controller operates synchronously or asynchronously. In SPI_MODE_BLOCKING mode SPI_transfer() blocks code execution until the SPI transaction has completed. Only SPI_MODE_BLOCKING is supported.

Enumerator
SPI_MODE_BLOCKING 

SPI_transfer() blocks execution. This mode can only be used when called within a Task context
